import {Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html' }) export class FooterComponent { @Input() menuData; constructor() { } get menuItems() { if (this.menuData) { return this.menuData.data.data.navigation_menu[0].menu_items; } return []; } }
